thread.title: BRIEF-Ralph Lauren Says Q3 Total Revenue In Mainland China Rose 28 Pct YOY - Conf Call‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ralph Lauren Says Q3 Total Revenue In Mainland China Rose 28 Pct YOY - Conf Call‍​
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Ralph Lauren:
* ESTIMATE THAT GLOBAL DIRECTLY OPERATED E-COMMERCE BUSINESS WILL GENERATE ABOUT $380 MILLION OF REVENUE IN FISCAL 2018 - CONF CALL‍​
* Q3 TOTAL REVENUE IN MAINLAND CHINA ROSE 28 PERCENT YOY - CONF CALL‍​
* WE ESTIMATE ONGOING EFFECTIVE TAX RATE TO DECLINE BY ABOUT 200 BASIS POINTS
* NEW TAX RATE WILL EQUATE TO ANNUAL NET REDUCTION IN TAX EXPENSE OF ABOUT $12 MILLION OR $0.15 PER SHARE Further company coverage:
